title: Collective Design
content:
Does anyone know what any of these fonts are including the logo and body text

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [christiancervantes-collective05.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319211404/http:/typophile.com/files/christiancervantes-collective05.jpg) | 296.45 KB |
author: Gemma53

comments.content:
‘Collective’ is based on [Larish Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319211404/http:/www.radimpesko.com/fonts/larish-neue).  
‘DESIGN’ below it is [Brandon Grotesque](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319211404/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/brandon-grotesque/).  
And the text looks like [Aperçu](http://web.archive.org/web/20150319211404/http:/www.colophon-foundry.org/fonts/apercu/about-font).
